static member Editor : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper * string -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Html.IHtmlContent

Docs.param: The instance this method extends.
Expression name, relative to the current model. May identify a single property or an that contains the properties to edit.
Docs.summary: Returns HTML markup for the , using an editor template. The template is found using the 's .

remarks.para: For example the default editor template includes <label> and <input> elements for each property in the 's value.
Example s include string.Empty which identifies the current model and "prop" which identifies the current model's "prop" property.
Custom templates are found under a EditorTemplates folder. The folder name is case-sensitive on case-sensitive file systems.
